description:
Rosenbaum & Rosenbaum, P.C., is recognized as one of New York City's pre-eminent personal injury litigation firms representing individuals in cases throughout the New York City metro region. Attorneys at Rosenbaum & Rosenbaum are experienced in cases involving complex litigation, including medical malpractice, pharmaceutical product liability, motor vehicle accidents, premises liability injury and wrongful death claims.

Rosenbaum & Rosenbaum attorneys have been representing clients throughout New York City, New York, for more than 40 years. The firm has built its reputation on referrals from other satisfied clients and professionals in the legal field in New York. Attorneys and clients work as a team at Rosenbaum & Rosenbaum, focusing on building and presenting the strongest case possible for negotiated settlements and trial, if necessary. The firm practices on the principle that an informed client is better able to make the right decisions about the outcome of their case.

The firm offers a free initial consultation to discuss the circumstances of your claim with an experienced personal injury trial lawyer. Clients pay no attorney's fees unless and until their lawyers succeed in recovering compensation in a settlement or by jury award in a trial.

The firm's primary focus in every personal injury, medical malpractice or wrongful death case is to seek maximum monetary damages their clients are entitled to for medical costs, lost earnings, wages, and pain and suffering. Rosenbaum & Rosenbaum attorneys are not satisfied until you are. The firm is confident that the attorney-client relationship will be productive and worthwhile.
